input_args.passage: 'Cruyff Football - Cruyff Football | Cruyff Football is a way of understanding football, a style of play where we seek to have possession of the ball for as much time as possible. Online Cruyff ...'
input_args.claim: 'This style of play is named after Johan Cruyff, as indicated by the second source, which also tells us that Cruyff was a proponent of the football philosophy known as Total Football.'
